title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 181.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 181.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Part, the following terms have the
following meanings: (a) Department
means the Department of Environmental Conservation. (b) License or permit means the authorization
issued by the department to undertake a regulated activity involving wildlife
issued pursuant to Environmental Conservation Law, article 11. (c) Wildlife means all animal life existing
in a wild state in New York, except fish, shellfish, and crustacea, and shall
include domestic game birds, domestic game animals, migrant species and captive
exotic animals. (d) Euthanize means
to bring about rapid death. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
181.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
